enhanced_description: Ramco Systems, part of the USD 1 billion Ramco Group, is a next-gen enterprise software and platform provider. It delivers multi-tenant cloud and mobile-based enterprise solutions, distinguishing itself through innovation, including the adoption of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Event Driven Architecture to create 'Active ERP' and payroll solutions. Its specialized offerings include a Global Payroll platform with capabilities across 150+ countries, next-gen Maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul (MRO) software for the aviation, aerospace & defense industries, and integrated Logistics Software tailored for Third Party Logistics (3PLs) and Express Parcel Service Providers.
